website_summaries.verdict: Great for a lounge chair by the pool, with many colors to fit your style.
pros: Corded edges make these 2 pillows durable and give a sophisticated finish
Nice material that allows them to double as indoor pillows
Size is perfect for lower back support
cons: Wide weave on the fabric sometimes allows the stuffing on the pillow to leak through

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  Soft foam and quality fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom for mother's day. I had considered sewing a cushion myself, but after pricing out the foam and outdoor fabric...well, purchasing this was a good choice. I wasn't expecting much, but the foam is super soft and supportive. When it arrived, I sat on it and was surprised enough by the support that I called my husband over and sit on it too! The print on the fabric is bright and crisp- it's all around a quality cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Samie May

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend this product. Foam padding mashes down so much, I have the crosswise members of the chaise digging into my back. This pad was even worse than the 40-year old one it was intended to replace, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these pillows in blue and they are beautiful but please check the side seams
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pillows in blue and they are beautiful but please check the side seams. One pillow there was approximately a 3 inch section that was left open so I either had to return this one pillow or sew it with a needle and thread. I chose to sew it but I was not happy about the faulty workmanship. Please check all seams. I would love for someone to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Spent all summer on my exterior porch swing and has still maintained its color and texture. Really impressed with the durability in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, will have to see how it holds up to sun but right now I'm pleased with the purchase. Cushioning could be a little thicker and firmer bit I like the color and styling.
customer_reviews.author: cyssf

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Using this indoors for kitchen nook benches. Material is rough on skin. Foam inside is not comfortable. Am having to add some padding which defeats the whole purpose of buying them. I should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Madje

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cushions, no fading so far after 5 months, and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these cushions is excellent! I have 2 of them and they are out by my pool, under the Florida sun since Oct. 2016 and have no sign of fading!! Great quality fabric!!...and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pillow. not dark navy
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful pillow BUT i was expecting a dark navy. everyone here on the reviews seem to love what they call a rich navy. I'm not sure if it's going to work for me. i went out on a limb or threw csution to the wind or something like that and chose these bold pillows to go in my indoor room, everything else in grays and torquoise. I'll see if ican get used to it but i think the blue might have too much 'color' to work EDIT I'm keeping them! they and the chair work beautifully in another room. so pretty
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cushion!!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks of going from store to store looking for a love seat cushion, I found this. The stores had every other type of cushion imaginable except for a love seat. I ordered on the 15th after work and it somehow got delivered on the 17th - remarkable considering it was a Sunday!! I absolutely LOVE it!! It is about double the thickness of the original that came with the love seat. Very comfortable!! Consider this one of my best purchases this summer!!! Thanks Pillow Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Canamnf

customer_reviews.title: Got these lumbar pillows to compliment my new patio loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pattern and that these are lumbar height. The only issue is the poly fill. If the pillow rubs against the patio loveseat cushion, static electricity is created and it pulls the fiber strands thru the pillow cover. Kinda slightly annoying, but other than that, I really like the colors that pop. I have not tested water resistance as I always have the sofa/pillows covered with weatherproof cover. Solid 3.5* for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sana Benigno

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality for the price paid!
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly as the picture showed, can't read than durability yet since it's only been out there for about 10 days LOL. First couple of good Florida rains we had and it was pretty immediately soaked completely through, but I didn't expect it to have great water resistance since that was not claimed anywhere in the advertising. Quite comfortable to lie on, I feel like it was a good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cappy Cross

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is comfortable and fits my chairs perfectly. The comfort level would be better if they were thicker, but then they wouldn't fit my chairs. The dimensions are spot on. The color on the computer is a true representation. I am using this on outdoor dining chairs that are under a covered patio so durability and water resistance are non issues for me as I have other outdoor seating as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect on my lounge chairs from Lowe’s. They are thick enough to be comfortable. We just got them so can’t say how durable they are. However the color is beautiful! Great price too! Hoping they last!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great looking outdoor cushion
customer_reviews.text: The cushion was exactly as advertised. The right size and the colors are vibrant. It has already spent some time in the rain and looks as good today as when I first put it outdoors. The cushion is well-constructed with sufficient padding.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Troetel

customer_reviews.title: They are a nice material, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice material, sturdy, and attractive. HOWEVER, one of them came with the ties already out and I had to sew back in. Then within a couple of weeks someone moved cushion on chair and the ties pulled out of that one as well super easily. So I am giving 4 stars because the ties are clearly not well secured and I hope all the other ones don't pull out as well or I will be sewing all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Do you have baby chairs?
customer_reviews.text: Well I believe these cushions are designed for children' s chairs or I purchased the largest patio furniture in the world. I feel like a monster sitting on these tiny cushions. Beware of the size I do not think the measurements are accurate. Quality seems ok but seeing as they are the size of a dinner plate I may use them as cushy place mats instead of patio furniture cushions
customer_reviews.author: kyle Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our outside bench and the dog loves to sit on it. It is quite durable. It is very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench cushion
customer_reviews.text: Cushion fits well on my bench and is easy to keep clean. Also in the event of rain...it dries very quickly. Also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: susan scouten

customer_reviews.title: no way this is for outdoors!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: we had this beautiful bench pad outside for two days... and squirrels ate a huge hole in it trying to get at the stuffing I'd love to return this as its not for outdoors as advertised... any suggestions? Lynn
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit my chaise lounge perfectly. I don't if it is water resistant as I haven't left it in the rain. Well made and durable. Exactly what I needed and at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Stargirl

customer_reviews.title: Good qualty - Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality. My dog likes sitting on the deck benches and she loves the new cushion too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Bench cushion
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pattern, used outdoor under partial shade, has done well under all types of weather conditions. Still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: V comfy although only covers 2 of the 3 seats ...
customer_reviews.text: V comfy although only covers 2 of the 3 seats on my swing. I was able to fill the space with a huge pillow so it worked out perfectly for me
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them daily for a month. I was shocked at the pooling of rain water on top of the cushion, defiantly water repellent. Cushion still has comfort, paddy, after using them quite a bit. Very happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: william ray baker

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass Cushions!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these cushions! I purchased two of these and used them for one month. Then I stored them inside for the off season and put them back out on Memorial Day weekend. One of my guests laid on one and was instantly itchy! The cushions are breaking down and it feels like you're laying on fiberglass insulation! TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: lynz

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars but
customer_reviews.text: Was happy until I noticed there are no ties to the chair. I guess I always expect that but looking back at the description it's definitely not there. Other than that they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase & durability! Pattern just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of cushions matches the other pieces I purchased for bench style wicker set same pattern and style!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: We have wrought iron lounge chairs and these cushions are awful in comfort. No cushion at all and uncomfortable. It holds a lot of water on top of cushion and takes awhile to dry. Appearance is beautiful. Disappointed in overall comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Goedde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a dog bed that my pit would not chew or claw into. He also has been able to lick through some fabrics. This cushion has been holding up really well so far
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Quality may not be consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I received my replacement cushion for my wicker loveseat and it is worse than the original one !!...I love the color and design of the fabric but their quality control people are not doing their job. Hope to exchange this again! I also ordered 2 chair cushions and they were “perfect “!!
customer_reviews.author: lenny smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chair cushions . They really brighten up the backyard. I have been bringing the cushions in every day when it rains because I really don’t want them to get ruined fast but they were a great deal I’m very happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushions !!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and sturdy cushions. Good price and we love the colors. Fits perfect on our chairs.
customer_reviews.author: @audraschaney

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the navy and white crisp look of these! They really freshened up our patio. Highly recommend especially since they are reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: VOK

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: These fade after a season in the sun, considering a spendier replacement. But they’ve been awesome for comfort and durability. No rips or tears just sun beaten :) they also saved my cheaper plastic chairs from cracking every year so YAY
customer_reviews.author: Sminxy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but...
customer_reviews.text: Looked great on our chairs, but they faded in less than a season.... UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Rita A. Labruzzo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our outdoor swing because it was not in great shape. This makes it much nicer to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Faded and torn after a month
customer_reviews.text: After one month in the sun, these look horribly faded and the ties have torn off (we have six loungers and have never had a problem with other ties tearing off). These are basically only good for a month.
customer_reviews.author: brkp

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome on my porch swing
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Very comfortable. I used it on my porch swing and It looks super cute
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Nordbye

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect. Described in your ad as a "swing" cushion it was actually a cushion for a love seat and not long enough for a swing. I returned it (for a penalty of shipping) and the pillows that matched for another penalty. I am reluctant to order things w/ 'sizes' now from you. Sorry. Up to this, I have been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Neal

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these I purchased 2 of them. Great quality came new in plastic. No complaints here! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality and bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Worth every penny. These are actually overstuffed which is nice. I didn't think they would be but I love it. They are made well and bright colors. They look great with my solid navy cushions. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chair Cushions
customer_reviews.text: These chair cushions are top notch in comfort, durability, and aesthetics. Love them! Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on different types of furniture
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are perfect for my patio furniture. The size is ideal for both loungers and chairs and the pattern goes with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Houston TX

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cushiom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and I love it. Great color and very butt friendly. I haven't put it outside yet because there's a monsoon raging but the cats give it 4 paws up.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this some time ago 2 years I think and they have worn and lasted very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good.
customer_reviews.text: Used these pillows outdoors. Look good. Think they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit , happy it didn't come with ties! Sits well on my wrot iron chairs!
customer_reviews.author: christie a mcgeein

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: these held up well after being exposed to the elements all summer long. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BRIGITTE H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and comfortable cushions with a striking pattern. I paired them with some new black iron chairs I bought. They look great and are supportive for your backside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice firmness to it
customer_reviews.text: The color is true to the picture. It has a nice firmness to it. I have been able to dust dirt off easily. We have had some heavy rainfall so will update if that changes the pillow. So far it has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are made in the USA!! Very pretty. I really like them!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Year after year quality! Even in the Arizona heat!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the quality and
customer_reviews.text: Fits an old bench we painted perfectly, very pleased with the quality and comfort
customer_reviews.author: Love(on)Lexington Restorative

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fits!
customer_reviews.text: Love this -- it's stylish and very comfortable and fits my vintage chaise lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking pillows complete the set!
customer_reviews.text: These match the bench cushion I ordered perfectly making it a very sharp-looking set. I’m happy. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Makes the outdoor furniture look new again.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on our porch and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These chair cushions are very nice. Good quality & great color. Going to look perfect on my not-yet-painted Adirondack chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great, firm, waterproof cushions. Makes my yard look so classy. Try them, you'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: Chere Balsley

customer_reviews.title: they are nice quality and
customer_reviews.text: a little short for your average outdoor rocking chair...I wound up buying pillows to offset that. they are nice quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Love(on)Lexington Restorative

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cushion. It seems to be decent quality and is comfy. I have it on black rod iron deck furniture and it brought my deck to life. Love the clean crisp lines. Simple pattern and sophisticated. I also bought 4 of the square chair cushions for my matching bar height chairs and they look so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Love the cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cushion for my bench on the front porch. It was just as expected. My only con is It has gone up $15. since I ordered it less than a month ago!!! I wanted to order another one but not at this price!
customer_reviews.author: L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these cushions and love them all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cushions
customer_reviews.text: Thick fabric, well made...came in a giant cardboard coffin that a neighbor kid took to decorate and play inside.
customer_reviews.author: SJBayArea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great profuct very comfortable hols up well n sunshine or rain water wipes right off
customer_reviews.author: William E. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Chaise pads
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin........over my metal chaise...but just as described..lots of compliment s on the colors from guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue and white print is crisp & spiffly looking on my new outdoor white wicker loveseat.
customer_reviews.text: These look wonderful on my new white wicker loveseat. I also bought the matching seat cushion. A lovely ensemble on my white backyard deck. Crisp!
customer_reviews.author: Ireland Rules

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: Very thin padding. Did not meet measurements so doesn’t fit my swing. Colors are good though.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: These cushions are vibrant blue and very well made. True to size and fit our patio table chairs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moses and I approve of this very comfortable outdoor cushiony chaise...love it!
customer_reviews.author: RAQUEL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These cushions are very pretty, vibrantly colored, and good, firm quality. They are enormous. I had planned to use them on folding chairs at the kid's table, but they are too wide and long. Would be ideal for an outdoor chair I think.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMamma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and quality of these pillows! Very comfy and seem durable. We keep them in an outdoor box when not in use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern, the ties so they stay on well and professional look and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: teri Winkley

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have small bamboo chairs on my deck that are impossible to sit on without padding and these fit perfectly and are super soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it was pictured with tie backs! Mine does not have them! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: micki f belpedio

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as replacements for our patio furniture and I’m so pleased with them. The bold color and strong, contemporary graphic really stands out . Very well made and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bosshughes

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie bed
customer_reviews.text: This is for my dogs...3 doxies and they love laying on this! If it gets dirty in wash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Redman Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made product. Very pleased. Will definitely look for this brand when buying similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Arika-wani

customer_reviews.title: Style and price
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Comfortable and seems to jold up well to our desert climate.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and pretty. Easy to wash and doesn’t fade easily.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Fox

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous addition to garden bench
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Amazing. Look just like image online. Comfortable. We just placed these on a white garden bench along with the matching 45" seat cushion. I'll have to update later on how they do in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in DC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its color and firmness.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Thought it would be bigger compared to the bench since it was “recommended” to be purchased with the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows. Husband says they are "too full"
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows. Husband says they are "too full", to me that just means we'll made and won't sag. Great color, we have the blue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Valentines day and she loves. It's very comfortable and fits her chair perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TXfitness

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Wish it had ties to tie it to the bench. But I love the color and pattern!
customer_reviews.author: c kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cushion
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cushion...dense..I've had them for about 6 months now and they have held up. Color is still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E. Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: These cushions look find but are not the size listed on the website. The website says they are 18.5 inches deep and they are only 15 inches so way too short for my chairs so unfortunately I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: they are beautiful and easy care.
customer_reviews.text: the crispness of the look . it makes a great look for the Florida room. {Lani}
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Patterson

customer_reviews.title: My deck is a happy place now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the built-in benches on my deck. Definitely adds a touch of class plus comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie from Jax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow - Pillow Perfect :>)
customer_reviews.text: This cushion for our love seat was purchased along with other cushions from Pillow Perfect. Just like the other reviews we wrote, this cushion is crisp and fresh and fits perfectly. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota Val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect price point for what I needed. Print a little off-center on one of the two that I ordered, but I'm the only one who notices. Such a good deal compared to most lounge chair cushions. Great print.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, received in just a couple of days, durable and looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent price! I used this to place onto my homemade cinder block bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: incredible
customer_reviews.text: These pillows have altered the course of human history. The best duo since Starsky and Hutch, but look way better on my couch.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Blakey MD

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE BEEN LOOKING ALL OVER FOR A NICE LOOKING SEAT CUIION FOR MY OUTSIDE BECH
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN LOOKING ALL OVER FOR A NICE LOOKING SEAT CUIION FOR MY OUTSIDE BECH. WELL THIS ONE IS BEAUTIFUL, I ALSO PUCHASED THE PILLOWS TO MATCH. LOOKS MUCH BETTER THEN THE PICTURE.
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice. wish i would have purchased backs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick cushion and hardy fabric. I'll be enjoying this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Milli G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, good quality and cleaning them off is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cushions
customer_reviews.text: These cushions have worked out nice for my patio set. I have old metal patio chairs and needed some affordable but stylish cushions, these have been great. They have been outside in the sun for about a month and no major fading of the blue color. They clean easily.. had found some bird poop on one and was able to clean with basic soap and water and it dried with no stains. Only downside to these is that they are not very thick, so if you are sitting on them for more than half an hour, they get kind of flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, colors bright, dry quickly after rain. Price was right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, but returned as I changed my mind on the pattern. Otherwise, they are beautiful, well made and would suggest to anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

product_meta.title: Pillow Perfect Outdoor/Indoor Carmody Navy Lumbar Pillows, 11.5" x 18.5", Blue, 2 Pack
product_meta.description: Style Name:Lumbar PillowsAdd the perfect blend of color and comfort to any space in your home with this set of two rectangle throw pillows from the Pillow Perfect Carmody Collection. Dimensions: 18.5 in. L X 11.5 in. W X 5 in. D.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Includes two (2) outdoor pillows, resists weather and fading in sunlight; Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Edges of outdoor pillows are trimmed with matching fabric and cord to sit perfectly on your outdoor patio furniture
Easy Care - lightly spot clean or hand wash outdoor pillow fabric with mild detergent and cool water; then let air dry
Measures: 18.5-inch length X 11.5-inch width X 5-inch depth (measurements may vary up to 1-inch since item is handcrafted)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars951 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Import Designation: Made in the USA or Imported
